title: Is there a DK can be supported and covered?
body:
I got a replay that Malphite ruin and troll game but reported still havent got any response ?

Anyone know how to post replay here so i need to post replay to say that someone is guarantee by some DK and ruin game on purpose without penalty.

replies.body:
Thing is, if you were to post that replay (with the intent of showcasing another players negative behaviours), without censoring the identifying information of the player, it would more than likely get removed, as it would be a breach of our "no name and shame" policy (you can refer to the [Universal Rules](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) for the boards for more information).

If you feel like the in-game report wasn't sufficient, you also have the option of submitting a ticket to [Support directly](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (use the "Account suspensions or restrictions" option). It's important to note that they wont be able to provide you with any information regarding actions taken on other players accounts. If they have shown consistent "game ruining" behaviours, then something should be done, even if it takes a while for the systems to get there.

Another point to consider is that the IFS notifications (in-client pop-up when someone you reported is punished) is notoriously unreliable. It often only notifies a single reporter, and occasionally seems to miss the mark entirely. I would certainly recommend that you *not* use them as any indication of a lack of punishments.
